graph.original_query: I want to know the details of features for Mahindra XUV 3XO, use a single step for Retriever Agent but use multiple iterations in a single step to fetch detailed information, In the final iteration of the Retriever Agent combine outputs from current and previous iterations as final step output and then create a report.

nodes.description: Fetch detailed information about Mahindra XUV 3XO features using iterative searches. Combine outputs from each iteration with previous iterations, producing a comprehensive summary of features. Ensure each search iteration focuses on a specific aspect of the car's features to progressively build the information.
nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch detailed information about Mahindra XUV 3XO features using iterative searches. In each iteration, focus on specific aspects such as safety features, performance features, interior features, exterior features, and technology features. Combine the outputs from each iteration with previous iterations to produce a comprehensive summary. The final output should include all gathered information in a single, complete report. Include search queries used for each iteration in output.

'https://cargraze.com/blog/2025-mahindra-xuv-3xo-specs-design-performance-and-safety', 'content': '2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety  | Cargraze Home Cars Car Blog Tools Loan EMI Calculator Mileage Calculator Sell Used Car Check RC Login/ Register Home Car Info 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety Published On Dec 24, 2024 By Cargraze for Car Info A Comprehensive Review of the Mahindra XUV 3XO in 2025: Features, Performance, and Value Are you looking for a compact yet powerful vehicle that combines performance, safety, and value in one stunning package? The Mahindra XUV 3XO might be the car youre searching for! Lets dive into a detailed review to see what this model brings in 2025. Design and Exterior Highlights One look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO, especially in black, and its clear that this car is a head-turner. Its sporty design elements stand out with: Chrome Accents: The grille and headlamp finish feature stylish chrome highlights. Projector Headlamps with LED DRLs: These enhance visibility and aesthetics. Diamond-Cut Alloy Wheels: The 16-inch alloys add a premium feel to the vehicle. Safety Ratings: With six airbags and a five-star Global NCAP safety rating, this vehicle excels in safety. Roof Rails & Spoilers: Gloss-black roof rails and a sleek spoiler give it a bold presence on the road. Although the car lacks front parking sensors and certain accessories come as add-ons, its robust styling and road presence more than makes up for these minor drawbacks. Interior Comfort and Technology Step inside the Mahindra XUV 3XO, and youll be greeted by a modern and comfortable cabin: Dual-Tone Dashboard: Soft-touch materials on the doors and satin finishes on the levers add a premium touch. Advanced Infotainment System: A 10.25-inch infotainment display paired with a 10.25-inch digital instrument cluster ensures seamless access to information and entertainment. Steering Controls: A three-spoke leather-wrapped steering wheel includes controls for cruise and infotainment systems. Comfort Features: From automatic climate control with dual-zone functionality to wireless charging and a vanity mirror with illumination, convenience is a priority. While its disappointing that the glovebox isnt cooled or illuminated, the XUV 3XO compensates with thoughtful features like rear AC vents, adjustable headrests, and ample storage options. Performance and Engine Specifications Under the hood, the Mahindra XUV 3XO packs a punch with its turbocharged petrol engine: Engine Options: It comes with a 1.2-liter three-cylinder MPFI engine, delivering 109 BHP and 200 Nm of torque. Transmission: Choose between manual and automatic transmissions, depending on your driving preference. Fuel Efficiency: Mahindra claims an ARAI-certified mileage of 18.5 km/l, though real-world figures hover around 14-15 km/l. The cars ride quality, stability, and safety features like ABS with EBD, electronic stability control, and tyre pressure monitoring ensure a secure driving experience. Practicality and Storage With a 364-liter boot space, the XUV 3XO offers decent storage capacity. However, operating the boot can feel a bit cumbersome due to its electromagnetic button placement. The spare wheel, tool kit, and first-aid essentials are neatly arranged but require some effort to access. Final Thoughts The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an impressive contender in the compact SUV segment. While it has its minor quirks, the blend of safety, design, and performance makes it a strong value-for-money option in its price range. Would we recommend it? Absolutely! Add it to your shortlist and take it for a spin to see if its the perfect fit for your needs. Dont forget to share your thoughts on this versatile vehicle in the comments section! Comments Search Posts Recent Posts Is the Toyota Hilux Ideal for Adventurers and Professionals? Specs, Top Features, Performance, and Discounts Revealed CarGraze Jan 01, 2025 Mahindra BE6 and XUV.e9 Compared: Specifications, Tech Features, Pri', 'images': [{'url': 'https://cargraze.com/assets/img/otp-login-register.webp', 'alt_text': 'verify login account', 'confidence': 0.7}], 'rank': 3}, {'url': 'https://www.autocarindia.com/car-news/mahindra-xuv-3xo-your-questions-answered-431979', 'content': 'mahindra xuv300 mileage, XUV 3XO, price, mileage, features, performance, new details | Autocar India All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos Signup Login Find a Car Cars Compare Cars New Cars Upcoming Cars Car Price Car Loan Calculator Find a Bike Bikes Compare Bikes New New Bikes New Scooters Upcoming Upcoming Bikes Upcoming Scooters Electric Electric Bikes Electric Scooters Bike Price Bike Loan Calculator News Cars Bikes Motorsports Industry Marketplace Reviews Car First drive / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Bike First ride / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Features Features Travelogues Blogs Interviews Partner Content Galleries Videos Images Stories Advice Signup Login Change City Close Detect my Current Location Pick from Popular Cities Mumbai Bengaluru Delhi Pune Hyderabad Ahmedabad Chennai Kolkata Home Car News Mahindra XUV 3XO: Your questions answered Mahindra XUV 3XO: Your questions answered We tell you everything you need to know about the XUV 3XO, from its price and waiting periods to its performance and efficiency. Published On Jun 24, 2024 11:19:00 AM 37,311 Views Follow us on By Sahil Kukreja Share - Listen to this Article Your browser does not support the audio element. Mahindra recently launched the XUV300 facelift in India with a new design, additional features, a new gearbox, as well as the new XUV 3XO name. The compact SUV packs some class-leading features, and also gets the most powerful engine in the segment. If you are in the market for a new XUV 3XO, read on to find the answers you might be looking for. How much does the Mahindra XUV 3XO cost? The Mahindra XUV 3XO is priced from Rs 7.49 lakh, going all the way up to Rs 15.49 lakh (ex-showroom). The SUV is available in a total of nine trim levels, namely MX1, MX2, MX2 Pro, MX3, MX3 Pro, AX5, AX5 L, AX7 and AX7 L. You can check out the XUV 3XOs variant-wise price and features here . How does the XUV 3XO drive? The strong engines on the XUV 3XO are highlights in their own right, while the good ride also helps it fulfill the SUV brief. Youll feel a hint of firmness in the manner the XUV 3XO tackles bumps and potholes. At the same time, theres a very reassuring feeling of being in a car that can take some abuse. To find out more about how the XUV 3XO is to drive, check out our first drive review here . How fuel efficient is the Mahindra XUV 3XO? The Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ARAI-certified fuel efficiency of 18.89kpl for the 111hp, 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine with the manual gearbox and 17.96kpl for the AMT. The 131hp, 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine returns 20.1kpl with the 6-speed MT and 18.2kpl with the 6-speed AT. The 1.5 diesel has a claimed fuel efficiency of 20.6kpl with the manual transmission and 21.2kpl with the automatic. How does it stack up against Sonet, Nexon, Brezza? The XUV 3XO is the widest car in its segment (1,821mm), gets the longest wheelbase (2,600mm) and offers the biggest alloy wheels (17 inches). Its 131hp, 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine is the most powerful powertrain in the segment. At a base price of Rs 7.49 lakh (ex-showroom), the XUV 3XO is also one of the most affordable compact SUVs in India. Click here to read in depth about how the Mahindra SUV stacks up against all its rivals. How long is the waiting period on the Mahindra XUV 3XO? The entry-level variants have a waiting period of about six months, while the range-topping AX7 and AX7 L carry a waiting period of approximately three months. The report should include clear headings and subheadings for each feature category (safety, performance, interior, exterior, technology) and present the information in a structured and easy-to-read format.
